subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: A breathless cliffhanger was decided at Madison Square Garden when Erik Christensen and Mats Zuccarello scored in the shootout to give the Rangers a 4-3 victory.
snippet: A breathless cliffhanger was decided at Madison Square Garden when Erik Christensen and Mats Zuccarello scored in the shootout to give the Rangers a 4-3 victory.
